document_data.mainbody:
Nimbul was a bounty hunter sent by Sarevok Anchev to collect the bounty on the head of Gorions Ward in Nashkel.
The bounty hunter had a somewhat odd personality. He was a minor mage, and could cast basic spells.
Nimbul knew how to cast the spells horror, magic missile, and mirror image.
Nimbul owned a Topsiders Crutch, a pair of Senses of the Cat boots,This item was only found on Nimbuls body in the Enhanced Edition of Baldurs Gate. He fought with throwing axes and an enchanted short sword +1.
